name: Fluffy Friends 2
description: Let's help our little fluffy friends to find each other in the vast desert. Solve all the puzzles in the game using only the power of your imagination.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: any
